summary: 1980  was a leap year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1980  was a leap year starting on Tuesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1980th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 980th year of the 2nd millennium, the 80th year of the 20th century, and the 1st year of the 1980s decade.
